channel.title: HTML giving me errors on my webclient
channel.description:
I was just adding a webclient for my server and it gave me the error "white space not allowed"
here is the code
<center> <applet name="NearHonor" width="765" height="503" archive="https://dl.dropbox.com/s/fjril59im94u1el/Client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"/> </applet></center>
I have no clue what is wrong with it

item.title: HTML giving me errors on my webclient
item.dc:creator: @Mobster92 Mobster92
item.description:
@Mobster92 wrote:

Because a whitespace error is only triggered by XML. Nothing else.

Read full topic
item.source: HTML giving me errors on my webclient
